name: Garden
description: You are standing in a small garden. The planter beds are devoid of life, the soil seems dry. The drab facade of a house in disrepair forms the northern border of the yard, with tall wooden fences on all other sides.

west.name: Exit 1
west.description: A stone stiarcase descends in the west

south.name: Exit 2
south.description: A narrow earthen burrow leads south

north.name: Exit 3
north.description: The house's tattered front door lies to the north, slightly ajar
